alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 3:30PM AKST until November 30 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with periods of blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. Winds gusting to 60 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts may form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected tonight in the Bering Strait. At St Lawrence Island snow will mix with rain, winds will be less severe and visibility will not be as low.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
